map_help.title: Help
introduction: This is the map edit screen. Here, you draw shapes on the map, representing different divisions of the area in which you are organizing your collection.
Later, when your collection is in progress, each participant using Flat is assigned one or more of those divisions.
The following will describe how to use the different tab menus and buttons:
map_help.explanation_save: The "Save" button will save all drawn divisions to your collection.

explanation_map.introduction: The "Map" tab provides you with everything you need to navigate the map:
explanation_map.locate_me: "Locate Me" button to pan to your current location
explanation_map.locate_shapes: "Locate Shapes" button to pan the map so that all drawn divisions are visible
explanation_map.search: A search to find a specific location
explanation_map.map_type: A select button to set the map type (roadmap, terrain, satellite and satellite with labels)

explanation_tools.introduction: The "Tools" tab contains anything you need to draw on the map, such as:
explanation_tools.draw_division: "Draw Division" button to draw a new division onto the map and (while drawing) to stop drawing
explanation_tools.delete_selected: A button to delete the currently selected division
explanation_tools.select_color: Several colors to choose from for the divisions

explanation_divisions.introduction: In the "Divisions" tab, you'll find an overview of all maps that have been drawn onto the map. For each shape, you can:
explanation_divisions.focus_division: Focus the division on the map
explanation_divisions.delete_introduction: At the bottom of the list you'll find a button to delete all divisions:
